# OSActionAbortedHandler

**Type Alias**

The block to call before aborting an action object.

## Declaration

```swift
typedef void (^)(void) OSActionAbortedHandler;
```

## Ending the Action Early

- **Cancel**: Cancels the execution of the action’s callbacks.
- **Aborted**: Calls the abort handler of the action object.
- **OSActionCancelHandler**: The block to call after the successful cancellation of the action.
